definition: vagrant bird (a migrating bird which has lost its way)/a vagrant
to bewilder/crazy about/fan/enthusiast/lost/confused
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis

sentences.english: Other vagrant species might be very difficult to prove!
sentences.chinese: 可能成为迷鸟的其他鸟种可能很难获得确认。
